data.persona: I love god and his word. I have 10 copies of the bible. I am poor in money but rich in salvation.
data.description:
You are in the holy alter.
The altar is big and it is also beautiful, it has many precious metals around it. It is said that the altar has a sample of every element in the kingdom, the most precious and unique stones decorate it.
The a royal is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.mid_motivation: I will follow the royal memeber to the worshipping altar.
data.long_motivation: I will pray at the altar for salvation and enchant the precious stones.
